name: Baseball Giants from the 60s Online Quiz | MLB by Season | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who hit a grand slam in the 1962 World Series?
questions.explanation:
Chuck Hiller.

	It was against the Yankees' Marshall Bridges

questions.text: When the Giants traded Orlando Cepeda, who did they receive in exchange?
Willie Mays' first major league hit came against __________ ?
questions.explanation:
Warren Spahn.

	It was a home run that broke a long dry spell.

questions.text: Willie Mays was traded to the Mets for __________ ?
questions.explanation:
Charlie Williams.

	It's still hard to believe.

questions.text: Who was NOT a manager of the Giants?
Who was NOT a shortstop for the Giants?
The first of the Alou brothers to play for the Giants was ____________ ?
In a famous altercation on the diamond, Juan Marichal got into a fight with ____________ ?
questions.explanation:
John Roseboro.

	Marichal attacked Roseboro with a baseball bat.

questions.text: Which pitcher who was often accused of throwing a 'spitter' ?
The one-time ace relief pitcher for the Giants was ____________ ?
questions.explanation:
Frank Linzy.

	The others are non-pitchers.
